input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to work at sea world?
input_text.Response A: Sure! To work at Sea World, you need to be 18 years or older. You can apply online or in person. If you are hired, you will need to pass a drug test and a background check. You will also need to be able to work long hours and be able to handle stress.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
